name: Drop the Ball (itch) (Jack F)
description:
I dropped the ball with this game...it's a joke, you can laugh.

Just click the pieces with the Left Mouse button and drag them around. Try to get the ball into the goal box with out it touching the pink area.

Red = Death so don't touch red.

Green = Fast so it'll make your ball faster.

I did music, art, and level creation for this one.
